patthana11.8:1.1: Nakusalaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.8:2.1: Nakusalaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana11.8:3.1: Nakusalaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.8:4.1: Nakusalaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.8:5.1: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.8:6.1: Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:7.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.8:8.1: Nakusalaṁ naanuppannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nauppādiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:9.1: Nakusalaṁ naatītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:10.1: Nakusalaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:11.1: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:12.1: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.8:13.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
